week_overview: This week focuses on building your aerobic base with consistent easy runs and a solid long run. The single strength session will complement your running by improving stability and strength using only bodyweight.

running_sessions.workout_description: An easy-paced run to start the week, focusing on maintaining a conversational pace and relaxed form.
running_sessions.notes: Keep your effort level light, where you can easily hold a conversation.

running_sessions.workout_description: Another easy run, providing consistent aerobic development mid-week. Focus on steady effort.
running_sessions.notes: Pay attention to your breathing and ensure it's comfortable throughout the run.

running_sessions.workout_description: Your key long run of the week. Maintain a comfortable, steady pace throughout to build endurance.
running_sessions.notes: Fuel adequately before and after. Consider carrying water or planning a route with hydration stops.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.form_cues: Keep your chest up, core engaged, and drive through your heels. Ensure knees track over toes.

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.form_cues: Maintain an upright torso, step forward, and lower until both knees are bent at approximately 90 degrees. Alternate legs.

exercises.name: Push-ups (on knees or toes)
exercises.form_cues: Lower your chest towards the ground, keeping your body in a straight line from head to heels/knees. Push back up forcefully.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.form_cues: Hold a straight line from head to heels, engaging your core and glutes. Avoid letting your hips sag or rise too high.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.form_cues: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat. Lift your hips towards the ceiling, squeezing your glutes at the top. Lower slowly.
